description:
Get kids closer to riding. The pedal-like footrests on the 14x Sport Balance Bike lets little riders get used to shifting their weight and balancing on the pedals. The adjustable design accommodates growth spurts to grow with your child. When they're ready to move from striding to pedalling, you can install the pedal kit to turn their balance bike into their first pedal bike.

  • Steel construction is built to last
  • Easy-Ride pedal conversion kit (sold separately) turns Strider bike into a pedal bike, easy to remove so great for hand-me-downs
  • Adjustable seat and handlebars fit riders from 95-125cm with 40-58cm inseam
  • Designed for ages 3-7 years
  • Maximum Rider Weight: 36kg (80lbs.)
  • Smooth rolling tires use Schrader valves, compatible with any bike pump or tire compressor
  • Bike arrives 85% assembled, with instructions to take you the rest of the way
name: Strider 14x Balance Bike - Children
